reviews.review:
A mi me encanto y estas son las razones:
-la duracion aumento y mucho encomparacion al primero
-el poder jugar con amigos es INCREIBLE
-puedes crear niveles tanto para ti solo o con amigos y puedes jugar niveles de otroses magnifico
-portal es de los juegos que te da mucha risa...o quizas no...
Y por eso portal 2 es un gran juego

My friend purchased this game for me, and I'm more than happy to say that it wasn't a waste of money. I already knew I'd like it, as I've played this on my friend's Xbox 360 before, but this is the best version of the game. If your computer can run it, please pick up a copy! You won't regret it!
Божественный тонкий, черный, саркастический юмор, сюжет и его повороты, развивает логику, 10 /10
Классная игра

Великолепная и бесподобная философская головоломка с прекрасным тонким юмором. Однозначно стоит поиграть.

https://youtu.be/4I3GfIJanVU
A good story good jokes good co-op and relly nice puzzles 10/10
Хорошая игра, особенно прикольно поиграть на пару с кем нибудь! Прикольно и подумать и посметься! В общем игра на высоте VALVE умеет делать игры! Советую!

Portal 2 et Steam, c'est genre comme si vous disiez aimer Disney sans avoir regardé Aladdin. Pas besoin de lire l'évaluation, si vous aimez les gameplay rafraichissants, vous prendre la tête, l'humour noir, les IA et la co-op, go.
Nem sei se esse tal bolo era mentira mesmo. Mas o jogo é definitivamente uma maravilha da Valve. Abraços GabeN.

Игра прошла изначально мимо меня. Слышал и видел, но желание приобретать отсутствовало.  На распродаже приобрел. На удивление превзошла все мои ожидания. Три вечера подряд после работы были только с ней. Локализация прекрасна. 
Если не играл в это. Сыграй!
This amazing! :3
Really good game, a lot of fun to play, i recomend this game to anyone
Super jeu!
一款可以用伟大来形容的作品。
a puzzel game and a first person shooter is actually a fantastic mix~!
这是你和你的好“机友”相爱相杀的故事！结尾的歌跟一代一样好听，听完后竟然有点伤感不舍难道变成小受了。。。。。。。。。。
Fantastic puzzle based game

玩完传送门1后迫不及待地就开始玩传送门2了，这一部作品在操作方式上和第一部完全一样，但是多了很多1里没有的元素，而且测试也比1多了很多，真的是很多，而且剧情也是和1联系着，在游戏中还多了1中没有的双人合作，还能自己创建一个新的测试。剧情中的小蓝（自己起的名字= =）更是话痨，感觉和icey里的旁白差不多，让人感觉玩得很舒服。这差不多也算是一个神作了吧，特别喜欢这系列游戏，但是看剧情，这部应该就是最后一部了，所以强烈推荐大家带上身边的小伙伴一起玩这系列游戏！！！
最大的乐趣就是跟朋友玩创意工厂的图。扣脑洞啊！！！！

一个考验智商的游戏。
剧情引人入胜，关卡设计可玩性很强。
Hands down amazing. IF you liked Portal 1, you will absolutley love this game. Everything about it is amazing. It has hours of content. You should, really, really, buy it.

Didn't play the first one...after playing this, I don't think it's necessary. Great standalone with clever space warping puzzles. By themselves, the puzzles would be enjoyable, however, the amazing voice acting, stark atmosphere and compelling story pushed this over the edge to greatness. I'm hoping Valve makes a third installment!

Literalmente la puta hostia
why does valve make such good games?

比1代傳送門還更有難度
但又不至於太難
整你的[b]耐玩度[/b]以及[b]劇情內容[/b]還有[b]遊戲時數[/b]都大幅上升了
NICE GAME!!

Если вам надоели однотипные шутеры от первого лица и вы устали от хорроров с мрачной атмосферой. Вам хотелось бы использовать в процессе игры не только банальные WSAD, пкм, лкм, но и голову? Тогда эта игра-головоломка точно для вас! 
Стилистически  похожего типа игр пока что человечество не выпустило в свет. Правда во 2-ой части извилины напрягаются чуть тише чем в первой, но и тут Valve не отстают! Ваши шестеренки заработают снова в командной работе. Для тех кому хочется подумать за двоих - Co-op mod. 
Игра покоряющая своей постапокалиптической, НО не жуткой, а прекрасной атмосферой уеднения. Футуризм без излишеств. Есть сарказм, очагоразрывательные уровни, забавные персонажи и весьма интересный и необычный антагонист. Такой шедевр невозможно не посоветовать. Определенно рекомендую. (+еще и первую часть). Очень впечатляет малое количество насилия и больший интерес к такого рода играм от первого лица. Потрясающий сюжет, хороший геймплей и приятная графика.
P.S. Впервые была пройдена мной в год выпуска и пройдена повторно пару лет назад. С этого аккаунта за 8 часов был пройдет только Co-op mod.
10 скрипящих извилин из 10.
play. now.
Best!

Alright, Portal 2 is well done, I think the game is well put, and kept updated through the community with new puzzles, giving the game more replayablility.  However aside from the community's work, and just focusing on the game itself the puzzles arent great there just... Good. Now dont get me wrong there creative. But I played Portal 2 from start to finsh (Although I never played the first game.) and they are really really hard. But when I finally understood how to beat it I didnt get that: "Oh cool!" feeling. I just got that kinda "pfft really? Geez so obivous." And thats one thing I dislike about the puzzles, now this might not be for everyone but during my playthrough to me I felt kinda mocked as I did not realize how easy and quickly it could be solved when everytime the answer is hidden. But aside from that the game is really good on the dialouge and other things like Co-op, thats pretty cool.

Another thing I would like to mention is the story, eh. Its ok, some people call it a novel. And im not going to spoil it because it is well written, and has a pretty cool moment at one point or another. But what it really is, is just three characters, one doesnt even talk. And the other two are just robots who are opposites for a while then one of them becomes exactly like the first one. While the second robot just becomes a potato, not this is cool seeing the robot's personality change but eh I dont know. 

9/10 Good!

Also! I received this game for free in case you were wondering. And yes I would recommand it for its price but highly recommend you get it on sale, its a bit pricey, but theres only one payment so for the full content and that helps.

Mais uma excelente obra da Valve.
O jogo conta com uma narrativa linear que nunca cai em tédio, já que é todo feito de puzzles extremamente bem criados e de dificuldades diversas.
Tem o melhor estilo de ficção científica creepy. Ele usa conceitos de ciência e tecnologia já explorados no primeiro jogo junto de elementos humorísticos perfeitos, mas que sempre acabam criando uma atmosfera assustadora e estranha.
Temos aqui, mistérios revelados muito bem escritos e roteirizados e ótimos personagens e motivações, além de ser muito divertido.
Multiplayer excelente, e com opções de criação de mapas muito bem organizadas.
Recomendado com sucesso!
very nice
Esse Jogo é Incrível!!

- humorvolle Sprüche das gesamte Spiel hindurch
- gute und schwererwerdene Rätsel, die im CooP sogar nochmal komplizierter werden
- the cake is a lie
- durch Workshop erweiterbar
Adoro!!!

10/10 best innovative puzzle solving game ever made! great story/gameplay/twist/villain etc...
If you haven't play it then play it! or else you're missing a gaming masterpiece!
THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER!!!!!!! I play it every day.
Juste la meilleur jeu solo/coop au monde toutes époques/plateformes confondue !

So, The game is great for it's age. 6 Years later and if tops off every other game i have. (Note I play through shared libraries, Because I may or may not have forgotten a couple passwords here and there >.>) The stort is amazing, Not as nostalgic as Portal but I adore the humor, elegance and beauty of this masterpiece. Never thought such a simple concept could be turned into such a wonderful game. Beautiful.

_____________________
Pros:
-Amazing storyline, Doesn't feel linear or straightforward. With hundreds of unique easter eggs from turrets singing to the borealis, it is always replayable. 
-Unique and lovable characters, From the wide diversity of the cores to GlaDos and the turrets, Everything is lovable. "SPAAAACE" is by far my favourite line, Hands down.
-Still looks good, After six years. The game is still beautiful and still has a thriving and big community. Granted the game was made by Valve but nonetheless, Impressive!
-Humor, This is the games strong point. If you're looking for a game with smartass, witty comments from your enemies/friends. You will love this, It never gets old and every line of dialogue has been carefully planned out and executed.
-SPAAAAACE

Cons:
-Editor is a bit hard to get a hang of. The limit of items for use without external mods, (BEE, BEE2 etc.) is a huge downside for me. I can't be bothered to install any of that and i expect everything in the story to be available to mappers, Imagine the possibilities if we made dialogue, triggered explosions/animations, using the unique characters and potentially making your OWN story all in the base game. I'd pay an extra $20 just for that.
-Wasn't a huge fan of Cave Johnsons area of the game. I genuinely found it boring and excessive. But that's personal prefrence, I hugely prefer just the test chambers, Confined and straightforward. (Remember, this is an opinion :c)

Overall, The game is remarkable. 10/10 all round. Reccomend to anyone with half a brain

This game has an awesome backstory that I'd like to know more of, sadly, I don't have Portal*the first game*, but, I have a feeling how GLaDoS knows us, probably, in the first game*idk, never played it*, we "killed" GLaDoS, who probably got a new body, assuming the old one got destroyed, as she said in the game that, the player shouldn't trip over the parts that didn't get burned completely after we murdered her. I don't know she is, all I know is that, Wheatley activated her again by accident and now wants us to continue testing, I haven't gone that far in the game, but, so far, I love it, currently testing with GLaDoS, not sure why, some parts are insanely hard to complete, such as the area with 3 lazer beams and 3 nodes for the lazers to go in, I couldn't finish it normally so, I had to use the console to finish it, I went back and watched a tutorial about how to do it, it was tough, but, fun nontheless, I'll update this review as soon as I'm done with the game

There is not a lot to say about this game to be honest.

Gameplay? Pretty good in general

Graphics? Nothing to write home about but more than enough.

Puzzles? Just like any other puzzle game the difficulty varies greatly but some are vastly more complex than they deserve to be.

Story? Its alright but its suggested to read up a little bit before playing portal 2. 

Sound? Good.

Fun? You're bound to get bored and frustrated when the time comes for you to get stuck but most people with the ability to solve things will enjoy themselves quite a bit. 

Worth? You should really get this game (especially for co-op) but if you're going to play alone I suggest waiting for a sale.

hikayesi çok iyi

Забавный сюжет, приятная груфика, превосходная ГЛаДОС, интересные уровни и искрометный юмор. Все это дает право назвать Portal игрой тысячилетия! Уровни интересные и качественно проработанные, в меру сложные, но не слишком простые, что порой заставляется покумекать, но даже если у вас ничего не получается ГЛаДОС "поддержит" вас "теплым" словом и неприменно даст "совет". Если вы еще не прошли эту замечательную игру, то возьмите деньги, отложенные на доту/кс и купите Portal 2, я вам обещаю, вы ни разу не пожалеете. После прохождения одиночной кампании и кооператива, который доставил море незабываемых впечатлений, вы можете обратиться в workshop, который кишит различными интресными тестовыми камерами, как для одного игрока, так и для дуэта. 10 картошек из 10 и да отравиться мне нейротоксином, если я неправ)

Торт.

Игрушка превосходит первую часть во всём, а та сама по себе, была отличной. Основное внимание игрока обращено к занимательным головоломкам (их решению), однако не оставлен цепкий юмор. присущий первому порталу. Сюжет, как ни странно, удался на славу, хоть и подаётся по маленькой ложечке. Огромный плюс наличие отдельной кооперативной кампании, связанной мостиком с синглом.
This is a very good game 10/10

I haven't loved a series of games as much as the portal series. It's got it all; humor, excitement, plotholes, a great story, and so on...

Overall, I would recommend this game to everyone, who wants to have a nice time and a nice laugh occasionally.
Help me I can't stop playing there's so many good puzzles. I think I need rehab

双人模式通关，来写一波评测
爱死这个游戏了！堪称完美！单人模式开始一直有着很强烈的科技感，各种实验室激光云桥机器人之类的，过了一些关卡周围环境就变得空旷无垠了，一眼望不到头的孤独感很爽，后面又是大型工厂，主要倒腾各种类似油漆的东西。谜题难度一般，需要一定的观察力，剧情也不错，游戏和剧情也结合的很好。
这游戏和基友一起合作体验更佳，双人模式下主角变成两个萌萌的机器人了，可以两人一起摆各种姿势。游戏一共四道传送门了，需要一起思考并互相配合，玩的完全停不下来啊，还可以互相伤害啊，很欢乐。

this game is one of my favorite games and i am shore that it is one of yours as well because this game might be old but it is like a fresh breath of air each time you play it. The hummor in this game is amazing, one of my favorites was Wheatley trying to hack the neurotoxin generator and also the bird eating GLaDOS. The puzzles are hard but adictive and gives you a dark souls boss killing feeling after you finish the lvl. And last but not least, the voice acting was very nicely done and pleasand to hear even when GLaDOS makes jokes of you. (props to the ending song, i loved it)
내가 이게임에 가장 감사하는 두가지를 말한다면, 글라도스 양을 만들어 준것과 그 글라도스양이 부른 노래가 포함된 산운드트랙을 무료로 제공해 준 점이다. 이 게임은 그 무료 사운드 트랙 만으로 살 가치가 있다.

Great gameplay, humor, and voice acting allow this puzzle game to shine above others. That being said, it isn't afraid of a few emotional moments here and there. There were times when it was downright heartbreaking. Overall, a great game that looks amazing and will run on just about anything.
Good fun, but also challenging

Sensacional, zerei com um brother, passamos horas e horas jogando a campanha do multiplayer, o jogo não tem fim. Você baixa mapas na oficina infinitamente e eu amo jogos que usam raciocínio, seja com gráfico bonito, feio, ou se gráficos mesmo.
El juego si que da buenos ratos. Es bastante entretenido.

Valve'ın en çok satan Half-Life serisinin hikayesine bağlı olarak çıkartılmış Portal'ın devam oyunu.

Hikaye, işleniş ve konu bakımından oldukça hoş. Yeri gelince yapılan esprilerden tutun,karakter kadrosuna kadar seveceğiniz şeylerle dolu. 

Puzzle türünde bir oyun olan Portal 2, sizi bulunduğunuz ortamdan oyunun içine çekmeye yetiyor.Oyunu oynarken dünyadan koptuğum çokça oldu. 

Oynanış süresi de ortalama olunca, bir de coop olarak yepyeni bir hikaye eklenince Portal 2 tadından yenmiyor.

Fakat oyunun hikayesini anlamak için Portal'ı da oynamış olmanız gerekmekte. Şahsen ben bunu bir eksi yön olarak görmüyorum.

Ayrıca 31 TL biraz pahalı. Onun yerine indirimlerde 7,5 TL'lik müthiş bir fiyata aldım ve mutluyum.
这就是第九艺术。
The only puzzle game I play on a PC.
